translation.en: Netflix.
I can't! Whoa!
translation.zh: 大伙 尤其是…我不行了！

translation.en: ♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Clap your hands and stamp your feet ♪
♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ Come with us and you will meet ♪
♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ Full of joy and processed meat ♪
♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ Wiener, winner ♪
♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Super-friendly hot dog wiener ♪
♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ But not the kind you had for dinner ♪
♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ An awesome, bright-pink wiener winner ♪
♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ Wiener! Winner! Wiener! Winner! ♪
♪ Wiener! Winner! Wiener! Winner! ♪
♪ Pinky Malinky, yeah! ♪
[panting] Did you get that?
Hey, JJ, what's going on? Why aren't you getting changed?
translation.zh: 嗨 小杰 你还好吗？怎么不换衣服？

translation.en: [grunts] There's something weird going on over by my locker.
translation.zh: 我的储物柜里出怪事了

translation.en: -What do you mean? -I'll show you.
Look, I'll do it again.
-[gasps] -See what I mean?
Every single time. [gasps]
[Pinky] Yeah. That is weird, bro.
translation.zh: 嗯 是很怪 兄弟

translation.en: Today's Would You Rather:
Would you rather have a giant third eyeball in your forehead
translation.zh: 你宁愿脑门上长出第三只巨眼

translation.en: or have lobster claws for hands? Babs?
translation.zh: 还是长出龙虾爪？芭布斯？

translation.en: Uh, do the lobster claws come with super strength?
translation.zh: 龙虾爪会伴随着超能力吗？

translation.en: -Nope. -Third eyeball all the way, bro.
translation.zh: -不 -一直选第三只眼 兄弟

translation.en: Really? I thought you'd be more of a lobster--
translation.zh: 真的吗？我以为你更偏向龙…

translation.en: -[automated voice] Stop. -Huh?
-Stop. -[Babs] Oh!
-Stop. -[Babs] Talking stop sign?
[gasps] The robots are here.
Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop...
So, when did they put this in?
translation.zh: 牌子什么时候立在这儿的？

translation.en: Yeah, I saw them installing it last night.
Why? What was wrong with the old one?
translation.zh: 为什么？旧的有什么不好？

translation.en: I don't know. It was old, I guess.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我猜就是旧了吧

translation.en: Welcome to Episode One of Bob's Road Safety Ride-Along!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到第一集 ”跟鲍勃上路学行车安全“

translation.en: Today, I'm going to teach you
all about staying safe and distraction-free on the road.
translation.zh: 怎样在路上安全行车且不分心

translation.en: I've got six different cameras installed to make sure we don't miss anything I say.
translation.zh: 这里架着六部摄像机 以确保我们不会错过我说的任何话

translation.en: There's even one in the trunk. What-what?
translation.zh: 甚至后备箱中都有 什么？

translation.en: Okay, let's go!
-[automated voice] Stop. Stop. Stop... -[Bob exclaims]
-New stop sign! -[car horn honking]
Aw, yeah!
Out with the old, in with the new, boy!
translation.zh: 旧的走了 新的来了 哟！

translation.en: -Stop. Stop. Stop... -Stop!
-"Out with the old, in with the new"? -[JJ] Yeah, bo-bo-boy!
[chuckles] JJ.
I mean, I'm all for modernization,
like the time I designed a solar-powered suit.
translation.zh: 比如那次我设计了太阳能外套

translation.en: I liked the old one. It was a perfectly good stop sign.
translation.zh: 我喜欢旧的 它是个完美的停止标志

translation.en: I mean, come on, it's been in most of the videos we've shot around here.
translation.zh: 我是说 很多我们在周围 拍摄的视频里都有它

translation.en: Winter in Sackenhack!
[all groaning] Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot!
[Pinky] We used to give it hats -for all the holidays. -[camera shutter clicking]
translation.zh: 我们过去在所有假日里 都会给它戴帽子

translation.en: That old stop sign was cool. It was special to us.
translation.zh: 旧停止标志很酷 对我们有特殊意义

translation.en: How many of our other favorite things in Sackenhack are gonna get replaced?
translation.zh: 塞肯海克还有多少 其他我们喜欢的东西被换掉了？

translation.en: The old whale slide? Or the chinchilla-spank billboards?
translation.zh: 旧鲸鱼滑梯或者打灰栗鼠广告牌？

translation.en: All these things have special memories for me and my friends.
translation.zh: 所有这些都承载着 我和我朋友的特殊回忆

translation.en: If only there was a way to protect them from changing.
translation.zh: 要是有保护它们 不被改变的方法就好了

translation.en: "Beary McBear-Face, Sackenhack's founder."
translation.zh: ”小熊麦克熊脸 塞肯海克的创始人“

translation.en: This is really an important landmark. You can tell by the shiny, gold plaque.
translation.zh: 这是重要地标 这块金色闪耀的铭牌就足以表明

translation.en: Let's go get some boba.
[Perry] Mom, you know I'm allergic to boba.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你知道我对珍珠过敏的

translation.en: -This is really an important landmark. -[Pinky] Hmm.
Gold plaque.
-Hmm. -Boba. Hmm. [squeals]
Oh, I know what to do! [chuckles]
-Come on, guys. -Dude, what are we doing out here?
translation.zh: -来吧 大伙 -哥们 你在这儿干什么？

translation.en: JJ, do you remember that music video we shot in front of this mural?
translation.zh: 小杰 你还记得我们在这壁画前 拍的音乐视频吗？

translation.en: Yeah, dog!
♪ Three lil' piggies ♪
♪ Lil' piggies in the city Lil' piggies gettin' jiggy ♪
translation.zh: 小猪在城里 小猪酷毙了

translation.en: Well, how would you feel if they painted over this
translation.zh: 如果他们要在这上涂上新画

translation.en: or even knocked the wall down to build a new one?
translation.zh: 或把这面墙拆了盖新的 你怎么想？

translation.en: What? No, bro!
They can't knock down our history. They can't do that.
translation.zh: 他们不能拆掉我们的历史 他们不能这么干

translation.en: No, they can't.
Not if we make absolutely sure that this landmark is preserved forever.
translation.zh: 除非我们确保这处地标能被永远保护

translation.en: ♪ How we gonna do that I say, how we gonna do that? ♪
translation.zh: 我们该怎么做？ 我说 我们该怎么做？

translation.en: ♪ Is you gonna tell me How we do that, baby, do that? ♪
translation.zh: 你会告诉我 我们该怎么做吗？

translation.en: With this.
A shiny gold seal showing everyone how important this place is.
translation.zh: 闪耀的金色铭牌 用它告诉所有人这个地方有多重要

translation.en: Whoa, so gold and shiny.
Whoa, that is bright. Respect.
Exactly, JJ. People respect both goldness and shininess.
translation.zh: 没错 小杰 人们尊重金光和闪耀

translation.en: Uh, we put these on all of our favorite places around town,
translation.zh: 我们把它放到镇子里 所有我们喜欢的地方

translation.en: and then people will know to leave them as they are.
translation.zh: 然后人们就会知道该让它保持现状

translation.en: That way, we can preserve our Sackenhack just the way it is.
translation.zh: 这样 我们就能把塞肯海克保护下来

translation.en: Preserved!
Pinky, I wanna kiss the inside of your hammy mind.
translation.zh: 小粉 我想亲吻你的火腿心

translation.en: Aw, Babba-Dabba!
I'm preserving this old phone booth because it's where I first met Todd.
translation.zh: 我在保护旧电话亭 因为我和托德在此初遇

translation.en: It's very important that Sackenhack doesn't change too much.
translation.zh: 塞肯海克别改变太多 这很重要

translation.en: So, when the aliens come back, they'll know where to find me.
translation.zh: 所以当外星人回来时 他们知道去哪儿找我

translation.en: [Pinky] The ski jump.
The most important landmark in Sackenhack
translation.zh: 塞肯海克最重要的地标

translation.en: -and the foundation of our friendship. -[camera shutter clicking]
We gotta preserve it!
Preserved!
Now it'll be safe forever.
-[ski jump creaking] -Uh, let's look from over there.
Like, way over there.
Preserved. Our favorite park bench.
translation.zh: 已保护！我最爱的公园长椅

translation.en: Now, it'll be here forever, along with our favorite view.
translation.zh: 现在它连同我最爱的风景 都会永远在这儿了

translation.en: Guys, you should feel proud.
translation.zh: 大伙 你们应该觉得骄傲

translation.en: Our Sackenhack is gonna stay exactly the way we like it.
translation.zh: 我们的塞肯海克 会永远保持现在的样子

translation.en: I'm going to take a pano to celebrate.
translation.zh: 我要照个全景照以示庆祝

translation.en: Wait. Uh, what's he doing?
[squeals] Hey, hey! Wait, wait, wait! -Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! -Huh?
You can't take that! [grunting]
Hi. [chuckles]
This needs to stay here, where it's always been.
translation.zh: 它得待在这儿 也要一直待在这儿

translation.en: Uh, but it's broken.
Preserved. It's staying here. Hmph!
translation.zh: 已保护 它就待在这儿

translation.en: Oh, shiny. Gold seal. Yeah. Yep, seems legit. My bad.
translation.zh: 哦 很闪亮 金色封印 好像是鉴定过了 我的错

translation.en: That was close. They almost got away with this vending machine.
translation.zh: 太险了 他们差点拿走了自动售货机

translation.en: Um, isn't it broken?
Someone could say that about you, JJ.
translation.zh: 别人也可以这么说你 小杰

translation.en: Truth.
It doesn't matter if it's broken.
This is where we get our snacks,
translation.zh: 我们坐在长椅上看风景时

translation.en: for when we sit on the bench to look at the view.
Ooh, I'm on to something.
The vending machine, the view, it's all connected.
translation.zh: 自动售货机 风景 全都是相关联的

translation.en: Don't you see? It's part of the whole experience.
translation.zh: 你不明白吗？ 这是整体经历的一部分！

translation.en: If you take one thing out, everything is ruined.
translation.zh: 如果拿走其中一个 整个就都毁了

translation.en: We need to keep, uh... Ah!
[panting] This leaky, old water fountain. Preserved.
translation.zh: 这个漏水的旧饮水器 已保护

translation.en: And this puddle shaped like a rabbit. Preserved.
translation.zh: 还有这个兔子形状的水坑 已保护

translation.en: Ah, yeah. Oh, okay, I get it. [panting]
Big Tony the Trash Can. Preserved.
translation.zh: 大托尼垃圾箱 已保护

translation.en: Yeah! And this tree with purple leaves. Preserved.
translation.zh: 有紫叶子的树 已保护

translation.en: Even... [grunting and panting]
Chelsea, the chess-playing park man. [grunts] Preserved.
translation.zh: 切尔西 公园里下象棋的人 已保护

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, no, no. It's okay, it's okay.
[whispers] You're not going anywhere.
Can I call my family?
Friends, if we want the Sackenhack we know and love to stay the same,
translation.zh: 朋友们 如果想要 我们熟知并热爱的塞肯海克

translation.en: I mean, exactly the same,
translation.zh: 保持原样 完全一样

translation.en: we gotta stick shiny gold seals on everything.
translation.zh: 我们就得把金闪闪的封印 贴到所有东西上

translation.en: -Are you with me? -Locked and loaded.
We're expanding operations.
It's not just the big, obvious things.
translation.zh: 不只是大的、明显的东西

translation.en: It's the tiny details that make Sackenhack special.
translation.zh: 还有那些使塞肯海克特别的小细节

translation.en: And they need shiny gold seals, too.
translation.zh: 它们也需要金闪闪的封印

translation.en: Road safety tip 89.
Always keep your windows and mirrors clean to see everything.
translation.zh: 始终保持 车窗和后视镜干净 以看清一切

translation.en: -[Pinky] Preserved. -Huh?
Hey, Bob.
Preserved. There.
Phew, we did it.
Everything that makes Sackenhack special is now safe from change forever.
translation.zh: 所有使塞肯海克特殊的东西 从现在开始永远都不会变了

translation.en: [Perry's Mom] What is all over this water fountain?
translation.zh: 饮水器上贴的都是什么？

translation.en: [crying] I wanna live with Dad!
[Coach Freebird] Hey, hey! That's my baby!
[crying] They took my baby!
I didn't see the sign 'cause I don't...
translation.zh: 我没看见标志 因为我不知道…我不…

translation.en: [mumbling] My baby!
translation.zh: 因为我不知道…我不… 我的宝贝！

translation.en: Hold on. What kind of monster
translation.zh: 等一下 什么样的怪物会把鸭子粘在一起？

translation.en: -would stick ducks together? -[ducks quacking]
translation.zh: 什么样的怪物会把鸭子粘在一起？

translation.en: What have we done? We've ruined Sackenhack.
translation.zh: 我们做了什么？我们毁了塞肯海克

translation.en: Ugh. Our plan kind of backfired.
translation.zh: 我们的计划好像事与愿违了

translation.en: Totally.
[sighs] I know whose fault this is.
Aw, Pinky. Don't blame yourself.
It's that new talking stop sign.
translation.zh: 是新说话停止标志的错

translation.en: If it wasn't for that thing, none of this would have happened.
translation.zh: 如果不是因为它 这一切都不会发生

translation.en: Yeah. Everything was fine until it showed up.
translation.zh: 耶！ 它出现前一切都很好

translation.en: So much for modernization.
That stop sign is...
It's... it's bad.
Ugh! Real bad!
Yeah! That stop sign needs to pay.
translation.zh: 对！那个停止标志要付出代价

translation.en: -[automated voice] Stop. Stop. Stop... -[all grunting]
You'd like that, wouldn't you?
translation.zh: 你喜欢这样 不是吗？

translation.en: You'd like us to stop, wouldn't you? Not today, stop sign!
translation.zh: 你希望我们停下来 不是吗？ 但今天不行 停止标志！

translation.en: Get back in there, tiger!
[automated voice] Stop.
-Stop. Stop. Stop. -You tell him, Pinky! [yelling]
-Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. -[grunting and yelling]
Safety tip number 500.
When the sun is low, watch out,
translation.zh: 太阳很低时 要注意

translation.en: 'cause the light might reflect off your rear view mirrors and blind--
translation.zh: 因为后视镜可能会反光 让你看不…

translation.en: [shouting] Whoa! Whoa!
[grunting] It's sun blindness!
Stop. Stop. Stop.
Did somebody say "stop"? [yelling]
-Stop. Stop. Stop. -[Bob] Oh, God.
-Stop. Stop. -[Pinky gasps]
Oh! Pinky, are you all right? I nearly hit you.
translation.zh: 哦！小粉 你还好吗？ 我差点撞到你

translation.en: Yeah, I'm... I'm fine. Thanks.
translation.zh: 没事 我还好 谢谢

translation.en: [gasps] Thanks to that stop sign.
translation.zh: 再次感谢这个停止标志

translation.en: Stop.
Well, there's a lesson for us all in road safety.
translation.zh: 这给我们都上了行车安全的一课

translation.en: Nice work, partner.
[groaning] Air bags.
[gasps] No!
-[panting] Oh, stop sign. -[automated voice weakly] Stop.
No, no. I won't stop. I... I need to tell you--
translation.zh: 不 我不会停下 我要告诉你…

translation.en: -[slowly] Stop... -[shushes]
Save your breath. Save your breath, sweet little stop sign.
translation.zh: 别说了 可爱的小停止标志

translation.en: -Listen, I need to-- -[slowly] Stop...
Dude, just let me say my thing.
I had you figured all wrong. You... You saved my life.
translation.zh: 我完全误会了你 你救了我的命

translation.en: [slowly] Stop...
-No, no, no, no, don't go! -[sputtering]
Goodbye, friend.
So, I guess nothing stays the same forever.
translation.zh: 所以我猜没有什么是永远不变的

translation.en: Babs, JJ and I, we're gonna change.
translation.zh: 芭布斯 小杰和我 我们要改变

translation.en: And Sackenhack will change with us.
translation.zh: 塞肯海克会和我们一起改变

translation.en: But that's nothing to be scared of.
translation.zh: 但这也没什么好害怕的

translation.en: Uh, here's your new stop sign.
translation.zh: 这是你们新的停止标志

translation.en: [sassy automated voice] Stop. Stop...
Ooh! Sassy sign.
Stop. Stop...
Welcome to Sackenhack, new friend.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到塞肯海克 新朋友

translation.en: -Stop. -[giggles] So sassy.
♪ Three lil' piggies ♪
♪ Lil' piggies in the city Lil' piggies gettin' jiggy ♪
translation.zh: 小猪在城里 小猪酷毙了

translation.en: ♪ Three lil' piggies Three piggies in the city ♪
translation.zh: 三只小猪 三只猪在城里

translation.en: [modulated voice] ♪ Piggy in the city ♪
-♪ Piggy in the city ♪ -♪ Uh, yeah ♪
♪ Three piggies in the city Gettin' jiggy, uh ♪
translation.zh: 三只猪在城里 酷毙了

translation.en: -[modulated voice] ♪ Piggy in the city ♪ -♪ All right ♪
♪ Three lii' piggies ♪
♪ Lil' piggies in the city, yeah ♪
♪ Lil' piggies gettin' jiggy All right ♪
♪ Three lil' piggies, uh! Three piggies in the city ♪
translation.zh: 三只小猪 三只猪在城里

translation.en: ♪ These are people Who worked on the show ♪
♪ Some you'll recognize Some you won't know ♪
translation.zh: 一些你认识 一些你不

translation.en: ♪ What brought them all together Is they worked on this show ♪
translation.zh: 他们因为这部剧聚到一起工作

translation.en: ♪ Did stuff on this show Had jobs on this show ♪
♪ These are people in real life Some have children, husbands and wives ♪
translation.zh: 生活中 这些人有的有 孩子、丈夫和妻子

translation.en: ♪ Some don't have any of those And that's okay too ♪
translation.zh: 有的以上皆无 也没关系

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause whatever they do That's okay too ♪
translation.zh: 无论他们做什么 都没关系

translation.en: ♪ Hey, hey These are people ♪
♪ Hey, hey These are people ♪
